event.title: Talk "An endangered species: computer as a universal machine" at 2nd Cyber Security Day 2014 Dortmund, Germany
event.body: On 7 May 10:00 Matthias Kirschner 10:25 Matthias Kirschner will give a speech at the 2nd Cyber Security Day in Dortmund. The event is organised by the Alliance for Cyber Security, which was initiated by the German Federal Office for Information Security.
